dmca.title: Notices - realitysextape.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Peter Jakab [mailto:ptrjakab@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Saturday, January 29, 2005 12:26 PM
To: info@realitysextape.com; webmaster@realitysextape.com;
hostmaster@realitysextape.com; support@realitysextape.com;
copyright@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com;
info@pudcat.com; webmaster@pudcat.com; support@pudcat.com;
hostmaster@pudcat.com
Subject: Notices - realitysextape.com

 


RE:  Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") Notice


 

URL's Bearing Infringing Materials:   www.realitysextape.com
<http://www.realitysextape.com/> 

 

http://www.realitysextape.com/celeb-Carrie-Tucker-Miss-New-York(10558.02).ht
ml

 

IP Address:  67.18.126.197

Name Server:  NAME1.PUDCAT.COM (216.234.234.30)

Name Server:  NAME2.PUDCAT.COM (12.96.160.115)

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

We are litigation counsel for Carrie Tucker.   It has come to our attention
that your website pages bearing the URL above have been copying, displaying,
distributing, and/or linking to videotapes or their digitized versions,
containing likenesses of Carrie Tucker ("Videos") and still photographs
containing likenesses of Carrie Tucker ("Photos").

 

The Videos and Photos are all the exclusive copyrighted work of Ms. Tucker.
Ms. Tucker's copyrights to the Videos and Photos have all been filed for
registration by the U.S. Copyright Office.   

 

I have a good faith belief that your copying, displaying, distributing,
and/or linking to the Videos and Photos on the Internet (or anywhere else)
constitutes willful and unlawful infringement of Ms. Tucker's copyrights.
Neither Ms. Tucker, nor the Videos' co-producer (see attached affidavit) has
ever granted a license or permission of any kind to any person or entity.
In addition, your linking to infringing material or even posting without a
link the addresses of sites with infringing material will subject you to
contributory copyright infringement.  Furthermore, you have misappropriated
Ms. Tucker's name, likeness and title which will subject you to additional
liabilities and penalties under federal and state statutory and common laws.

 

We hereby demand that you immediately and permanently remove all Videos and
Photos containing likenesses of Ms. Tucker from all websites and other media
that you own or control and remove any and all links, URLs and/or references
to said infringing materials.

 

Failure to do so will leave us no choice but to file suit against you for
injunction, damages, attorney's fees and other penalties under the DMCA, the
Copyright Act and other federal and state laws without further notice to
you.  You probably know that these laws provide copyright holders like Ms.
Tucker with very strong remedies against, and that the courts have dealt
severely with, infringers like you under similar circumstances.

 

Please acknowledge to me by email (
<http://mail.yahoo.com/config/login?/ym/Compose?To=ptrjakab@yahoo.com>
ptrjakab@yahoo.com) or letter that:

 

1.      you have permanently stopped using, publishing, distributing,
copying, displaying, linking to, selling, licensing or otherwise exploiting
the Videos and/or the Photos in any manner, including any other websites
that you are affiliated with;

 

2.      you have destroyed all electronic and hard copies of the Videos and
Photos, including all system backups;

 

3.      you have informed every identifiable person and entity who works
with you, or with your affiliated websites and companies, of the above
information;

 

4.      an accounting of any and all monies that you and any affiliated
websites have received from the use, publishing, distribution, copying,
displaying and any other exploitation of the Videos and the Photos;

5.      a list of websites, with URLs and contact information, that you are
affiliated with or have linking agreements with;

 

6.      the source including a list of names, e-mail addresses, and any
other contact information of those persons and/or other entities from which
you obtained the Videos and the Photos.

 

I acknowledge that the above-stated information is true and accurate under
penalty of perjury and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the
copyright holder, Ms. Tucker.

 

/S/

PETER JAKAB

cc: Ms. Carrie Tucker

------------------------------------------------------------

PETER JAKAB

FEIN & JAKAB

ATTORNEYS AT LAW

233 BROADWAY - SUITE 930

NEW YORK, NY  10279

212/732-9290 PH

212/227-6479 FX

E-MAIL: ptrjakab@yahoo.com

------------------------------------------------------------

The information contained herein is confidential and may contain
attorney-client or other privileged information and is intended only for the
individual or entity to whom it is addressed. Any unauthorized use,
distribution, copying, or publishing of this communication in whole or in
part is strictly prohibited.  If you have received this e-mail in error,
please notify the law office of FEIN & JAKAB immediately at 212/732-9290 and
kindly delete it from your computer or server. Thank you.

  _____  

Do you Yahoo!?
